title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.30 - Individuals prohibited from endangering others at terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.30 - Individuals prohibited from endangering others at terminal

State Regulations

No person shall, in or upon a terminal do or omit to do any
act if the doing or omission thereof endangers unreasonably or is likely to
endanger unreasonably persons or property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
